diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AE$ is $2x + 1$ units.
The length of the line $BE$ is $3x - 5$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $AE$.
The line $ED$ is perpendicular to the line $BE$.
The length of the line $CD$ is equal to the length of the line $BD$.
